CustomField.description: This field is for the mobile number of the contact or lead of the test drive used in the web test drive booking
CustomField.formula: IF(Prospect__c != null && Prospect__r.MobilePhone != null, Prospect__r.MobilePhone, IF(Lead__c != null && Lead__r.MobilePhone != null,Lead__r.MobilePhone,'' ))
CustomField.label: MobilePhone
